head.title: Ms. Fee to Wed Bruce Kaskey

hedline.hl1: Ms. Fee to Wed Bruce Kaskey

block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Frank J. Fee 3d of Scarsdale, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Christine Margaret Fee to Bruce D. Kaskey, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Vernon C. Kaskey of Savannah, Ga. An October wedding is planned.

Ms. Fee, 24 years old, is a sales manager for Nestle Food in New York. She graduated from Boston College. Her father is the president of the Reliable Automatic Sprinkler Company in Mount Vernon, N.Y. Her mother, Barbara Fee, is a real-estate broker with Cleveland Van Wert of Scarsdale.

Mr. and Mrs. Frank J. Fee 3d of Scarsdale, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Christine Margaret Fee to Bruce D. Kaskey, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Vernon C. Kaskey of Savannah, Ga. An October wedding is planned.

Ms. Fee, 24 years old, is a sales manager for Nestle Food in New York. She graduated from Boston College. Her father is the president of the Reliable Automatic Sprinkler Company in Mount Vernon, N.Y. Her mother, Barbara Fee, is a real-estate broker with Cleveland Van Wert of Scarsdale.
Mr. Kaskey, 29, is a technical sales representative for Eastman Kodak in New York. He graduated from Ithaca College. His father is a sales representative in Savannah for American Carbon Industries.
